Typography

Type Scale

Shows the scaling of text

Tag Size Weight

Heading One

 h1 2rem / 32px Bold (700)

Heading Two

 h2 1.5rem / 24px Semi-bold (600)

Heading Three

 h3 1.25rem / 20px Semi-bold (600)

Heading Four

 h4 1rem / 16px Medium (500)
Heading Five
 h5 0.875rem / 14px Semi-bold (600)
Heading Six
 h6 0.75rem / 12px Semi-bold (600)

Body

 p 0.875rem / 14px Normal (400)
Body Bold strong 0.875rem / 14px Bold (700)
Small small 0.75rem / 12px Normal (400)

Paragraph

The default body text is 14px.

For optimum reading length, the paragraph width for articles is capped at 635px.
Use the <article> tag to apply the max-width property to <p> tags.
